name: Babe Ruth
comment: The only real game, I think, is baseball.

name: Jackie Robinson
comment: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.

name: Muhammad Ali
comment: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

name: Michael Jordan
comment: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.

name: Wayne Gretzky
comment: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

name: Serena Williams
comment: I'm a perfectionist. I'm pretty tough on myself.

name: LeBron James
comment: I'm not a businessman; I'm a business, man.

name: Pele
comment: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

name: Tiger Woods
comment: The greatest thing about tomorrow is I will be better than I am today.

name: Roger Federer
comment: There is no way around the hard work. Embrace it.

name: Tom Brady
comment: I'm a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.

name: Lionel Messi
comment: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.

name: Usain Bolt
comment: I told you all I was going to be number one, and I did just that.

name: Christiano Ronaldo
comment: Your love makes me strong, your hate makes me unstoppable.

name: Babe Didrikson Zaharias
comment: The formula for success is 2% inspiration, 98% perspiration.

name: Michael Phelps
comment: If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren't willing to do.

name: Larry Bird
comment: A winner is a person who gets up one more time than he is knocked down.

name: Mia Hamm
comment: My coach said I run like a girl. I said if he ran a little faster, he could too.

name: Drew Brees
comment: If you're willing to work hard and get after it, you can achieve anything.

name: Kobe Bryant
comment: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.

name: Arnold Palmer
comment: The most important shot in golf is the next one.

name: Joe Montana
comment: I don't think I'll ever be a normal person.

name: Ken Griffey Jr.
comment: It's not what you are, it's what you don't become that hurts.

name: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
comment: The rewards of a life well lived are many. The challenges of a life well lived are many more.

name: Walter Payton
comment: Never die easy. Why run out of bounds and quit? Why not take a hit?

name: Emmitt Smith
comment: You've got to be willing to get out of your comfort zone, and I am.

name: Abby Wambach
comment: We have to be our own heroes.

name: Derek Jeter
comment: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.

name: Dale Earnhardt
comment: The best way to get something done is to begin.

name: Lou Gehrig
comment: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.

name: Conor McGregor
comment: The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.

name: Danica Patrick
comment: I'm going to go after this until I have no more to give.

name: Jack Nicklaus
comment: The difference between a good player and a great player is how they perform under pressure.

name: Mike Tyson
comment: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.

name: Nadia Comaneci
comment: I don't run from a challenge, I run towards it.

name: Babe Ruth
comment: I swing big, with everything I've got. I hit big or I miss big.

name: Kobe Bryant
comment: I'm here to play and to win.

name: Michael Jordan
comment: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.

name: Muhammad Ali
comment: Don't count the days, make the days count.

name: Wayne Gretzky
comment: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.

name: Mia Hamm
comment: Somewhere behind the athlete you’ve become and the hours of practice and the coaches who have pushed you is a little girl who fell in love with the game and never looked back.

name: Derek Jeter
comment: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.

name: Tom Brady
comment: The only thing that matters is winning.

name: Serena Williams
comment: I am not afraid of anyone. I have nothing to lose.

name: LeBron James
comment: I'm just a kid from Akron, Ohio, who had a dream.

name: Pele
comment: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.

name: Tiger Woods
comment: I don't mind not being number one, as long as I can feel it.

name: Roger Federer
comment: When you're good at something, you'll feel it. When you're great at something, you'll know it.

name: Usain Bolt
comment: Don't think about the competition. Just focus on yourself.

name: Christiano Ronaldo
comment: I am not a one-man show. I am a team.
